column1: Thanks for having me @JoeforNH! I had a great time talking to voters in the Granite State about what’s at stake in this election. We can’t afford four more years of Donald Trump -- sign up to volunteer and do your part now: https://t.co/jvRhjQj2xr #NHPolitics
@panama1955nh @JoeForNH @JoeBiden We did! Thank you for the recommendation Garry. https://t.co/nln14eQdmc

A woman's place is in the halls of government in the corner office and anywhere else she wants to be. #TeamTitus was proud to join the #EmpoweringWomenMarch today in #District1. https://t.co/pUgIH7PmS4

I’m back on the road for @JoeBiden! I’ll be taking over the @JoeforNH account today as I travel around the #FITN state to talk to voters about why Joe is the best candidate to beat Trump. Follow along! #NHPolitics https://t.co/m8HilE2jI2
Last stop today a @JoeForNH house party and an active discussion with Nashua residents. Thank you Rep. @GregIndruk for opening up your home to us. https://t.co/qGRLZJ7XmZ
Next I spoke with strong supporters of @JoeBiden in Salem about the issues that matter most to them. #NHPolitics https://t.co/P4VYLZpjex
I’m in New Hampshire for @JoeBiden ahead of the #FITN primary to talk to voters about why Joe is the best candidate to beat Trump. First stop—Portsmouth! #NHPolitics https://t.co/7Oo5i3RuZW
I hope you can join the @JoeForNV team and me at the MLK parade #OnlyInDistrict on Monday. Sign-up today >> https://t.co/HjIV68zFql

Happy #Kwanzaa to all those celebrating the Seven Principles: unity self-determination collective work and responsibility cooperative economics purpose creativity and faith.
Throughout the year and particularly during the holidays I am grateful for your support.   Tom Mama and all of #TeamTitus wish you and yours a very Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays.

Nevada lost a true warrior in the passing of long time civil rights activist Harriet Trudell. Her commitment to social justice is an inspiration to all of us. She will be dearly missed.

I told my constituents that I would speak up about this race once I reached a decision about who will be our strongest nominee. Now I am making good on that promise. I’m excited to campaign for Joe in Nevada and across the country. (2/2)

Today I’m proud to announce my endorsement of Joe Biden for President. I’m a proud progressive champion and I believe that nominating Joe gives us the best chance to enact the progressive reforms that our country desperately needs. (1/2)
